# items

**Instance Property**

The items displayed on the toolbar.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var items: [UIBarButtonItem]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The items, instances of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBarButtonItem], that are visible on the toolbar in the order they appear in this array. Any changes to this property aren’t animated. Use the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIToolbar/setItems(_:animated:)] method to animate changes.

The default value is `nil`.

## Configuring toolbar items

- **setItems(_:animated:)**: Sets the items on the toolbar by animating the changes.

items.description: Sets the items on the toolbar by animating the changes.
items.name: setItems(_:animated:)
